title: GCC-X-SHIFT HACKATHON
description: Secured 1st Prize in the GCC X-SHIFT Hackathon Hiring Challenge, organized by 6S Consulting PVT LTD. Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving and technical skills in a competitive environment.

title: Spectra-x Competition
description: Achieved 2nd Prize in the Spectra-x Technical Competition organized by IEEE IES at KPRIET. Showcased expertise in innovation and technical implementation.

title: INNOVSENSE'25 Competition
description: Secured 4th Position in the INNOVSENSE'25 Innovation Competition at KPRIET. Demonstrated creative problem-solving and project execution capabilities.

title: Inter Unit Competition - NSC 2024
description: Earned Runner-Up position in the Service Subject Examination during NSC 2024 at 1(P) Naval Unit NCC. Demonstrated commitment to professional development and excellence.

title: Annual Training Camp 2024
description: Achieved Runner-Up status in both Service Subject Examination and Overall Category at the Annual Training Camp 2024, 2TN Naval Unit NCC. Demonstrated leadership and consistent performance.

title: Professional Workshop Participation
description: Active participation in industry-leading professional workshops and seminars. Continuously engaged in skill enhancement and staying updated with current industry trends and best practices.

title: Community Engagement Initiative
description: Contributed to community development programs and professional networking events. Demonstrated commitment to knowledge sharing and collaborative learning within the tech community.

title: Technical Certification Program
description: Successfully completed advanced technical certification programs to strengthen expertise in emerging technologies. Committed to continuous professional growth and skill development.

title: Volunteer Technical Mentor
description: Served as a technical mentor, guiding junior developers and students in their professional journey. Contributed to knowledge transfer and mentorship within the technology sector.

title: Industry Conference Speaker
description: Presented insights and expertise at professional conferences and technical meetups. Shared knowledge on emerging technologies and best practices with industry peers.
